data.name: School-Live!
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Yuki’s high school has everything: solar power, a well-stocked school store, an amazing library, a garden on the roof, and the best friends she could ask for. She’s the most energetic member of the School Living Club, an exclusive club dedicated to fully integrating themselves with the school. They even live in it! Life couldn’t be more exciting for Yuki and her friends… except that their club holds a dark secret.
data.about_the_game: Yuki’s high school has everything: solar power, a well-stocked school store, an amazing library, a garden on the roof, and the best friends she could ask for. She’s the most energetic member of the School Living Club, an exclusive club dedicated to fully integrating themselves with the school. They even live in it! Life couldn’t be more exciting for Yuki and her friends… except that their club holds a dark secret.
data.short_description: Yuki is the most energetic member of the School Living Club, a club that’s so dedicated to the school that they live in it! However, the club’s true nature holds a dark secret.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7
  • 处理器: 英特尔酷睿 2 处理器或相同性能的 AMD 处理器
  • 内存: 1 GB RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: 5Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 540p，3Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 360p。
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 10
  • 处理器: 推荐搭载英特尔酷睿 I3 和以上的处理器，或相同性能的 AMD 处理器播放 1080p 高清视频
  • 内存: 2 GB RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: 12Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 1080p，8Mbit/s 的网络带宽适合 720p。
